name: Darkpea Garden
description:
My first time submitting to a game jam and tinkering with game development. More of a learning experience than a game. Had a great time figuring out how to implement the basic mechanics and creating all the assets. 

Thanks to Terry Cavanagh for running the Jam, check out the other cool submissions :)

https://itch.io/jam/stop-waiting-for-godot/entries
